Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: No new objects were added for this release
Deceased Flag â€“ to indicate deceased status of a person at request of CEM.
New Types: a) HomeRoomType b)StaffRefIdType added to correct Venetian Blind typing
New Types for Venetian Blind typing of SystemRole and ResourceUseage Objects
TravelDetailsContainerType and SchoolTravelType added to support CEM requirements around student travel arrangements.
New enumeration added to the Sex Code Set to represent Victorian legislation, value added; 4 - Self-described

Section.h5: New CodeSets added to support CEM Travel mode additions

ul.li: Travel Mode - Introduced by CEM to indicate mode of travel of the student to/from school.
Accompaniment - Introduced by CEM to indicate whether or not the student is accompanied to/from school.
FSystemRole and ResourceUsage Objects have been reformatted to Venetian Blind

ul.p: Several Types used in the AG Collections were changed to xs:unsignedInt as they are required to be positive integers.
ul.li: Stats Collection (Attendance) - DaysInReferencePeriod, PossibleSchoolDays, AttendanceLess90Percent, AttendanceGTE90Percent, PossibleSchoolDaysGT90PercentAttendance

Census collection: Student Reporting: Headcount, CensusAge; Staff Reporting: Headcount; StudentSchoolEnrollment: CensusAge - was listed as a decimal, it is required to be a positive integer for AG reporting.
ul.p: Code set corrections were as follows:
ul.li: a) Correction of the description of NAP Jurisdiction enumerations. Western Australia listed twice. Code Set updated.
b) Correction of ill-formed value in LearningStandardItem Relationship Types enumeration set.

ul.p: AG have requested the following deletions:
